welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sucat, Philippines! Known for its vibrant culture and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves as the main hub for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves as the hub for local budget airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
